alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Rutland; Essex (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 16 at 3:31PM EST until January 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Essex, Eastern Chittenden, Eastern Addison and Eastern Rutland Counties in Vermont. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down due to a period of heavy wet snow prior to these strong wind gusts, resulting in isolated to scattered power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts are expected to take place between 4 AM to 10 AM across the central and southern Greens and 9 AM to 1 PM in Essex County Vermont on Monday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Rutland; Essex
